title: Why can't I gift the runepage bundle?
body: Wanna gift a few of them to a friend of mine, but it won't let me or I can't find it. Is there a way to gift runepages?

replies.body: I think it's really cool of you to want to gift that to your friend, but rune pages aren't currently available for gifting.  As an alternative, you can also gift him RP and he can unlock it himself.  I hope that helps!

Ah okay, thanks. Will do. I did read an older forumpost(2 years ago) that asked the same. They said they're working on it. Will it be available anytime soon? I'd like to gift bundles and such. Gifting RP is like giving money as a present imo. :P
